aboutInfo.resume: As a Project and Operations Manager, I have acquired both national and international experience, working with clients across LATAM and the USA. I have led projects involving a wide range of technologies, including SAP, ServiceNow, RPA, OutSystems, Salesforce, and application modernization, consistently focusing on efficiency and innovation. My work has generated approximately R$6 billion in savings for clients, in addition to managing contracts worth over R$100 million. With more than eight years of leadership experience, I have had the opportunity to manage teams comprising over 300 professionals across projects in various sectors. My background as a developer and tech lead for four years has further strengthened my technical expertise, providing me with a comprehensive understanding of the operational challenges involved in project delivery.Throughout my career, I have developed solid expertise in operations leadership, project and team management, and client relationship management. I have been directly involved in numerous initiatives, ranging from e-commerce solutions to process automation and SaaS platforms. As a specialist in process automation, I also have experience in pre-sales, contributing to the successful closure of medium- and large-scale contracts.My decision-making approach is strongly data- and statistics-driven, ensuring strategic alignment and the optimization of outcomes. Additionally, I am actively involved in training and mentoring new managers and leaders, delivering programs aimed at qualification and professional development in the job market.

description.0: American Express is one of the global leaders in financial services, specializing in credit cards, digital payments, travel, and banking services. With over 160 years of history, American Express operates in more than 130 countries, offering innovative financial solutions to consumers, businesses, and merchants worldwide. With a customer base that includes millions of individuals and companies of various sizes, the company is recognized for its commitment to excellence and trust in the financial market. This OutSystems project primarily aims to achieve the digital transformation of American Express by creating applications focused on the financial area. The initiative seeks to optimize internal processes, improving agility and efficiency in the company's financial operations. Through the use of the OutSystems platform, American Express aims to develop innovative and customized solutions that meet the growing demands of the financial sector, ensuring a more agile and secure experience for its customers and business partners. With this project, American Express continues its digital innovation journey, creating a significant impact on its operations and the financial market by adopting new technologies that enhance the management of transactions, payments, and financial services.
description.1: Apple is one of the largest and most influential technology companies in the world, known for its innovation in hardware, software, and digital services. With iconic products such as the iPhone, iPad, MacBook, and Apple Watch, Apple has a global presence and more than 147,000 employees. Its impact on the technology market is unparalleled, with millions of customers worldwide and a strong base of consumer loyalty. This OutSystems project aims to support Apple's digital transformation by creating innovative applications for the technology area. The initiative seeks to optimize and accelerate the development of internal solutions, improving integration between teams and systems while providing agility in the delivery of new products and services. The use of OutSystems allows Apple to create and adapt applications quickly to meet the growing demands of the market and its internal processes. Through this project, Apple aims to further strengthen its leadership in innovation by using the OutSystems platform to create faster and more efficient digital solutions, aligning with its goals of technological transformation and continuous evolution in the market.
description.2: ArcelorMittal is one of the largest steel companies in the world, operating in the production of steel and other metals, with a global presence in more than 60 countries. With over 190,000 employees, ArcelorMittal is a leader in steel production and offers products for various sectors, including construction, automotive, and infrastructure. The company is known for its commitment to innovation, sustainability, and operational excellence. The RPA (Robotic Process Automation) project, using the Automation Anywhere platform, primarily aims to promote ArcelorMittal's digital transformation, focusing on saving operational hours and reducing costs. Automation is being implemented in critical processes using Microsoft Excel and SAP, optimizing workflows, reducing reliance on manual tasks, and increasing efficiency in operations. This initiative aims not only to increase productivity but also to ensure greater accuracy and consistency in processes, allowing ArcelorMittal to focus on its strategic activities and continue to lead the industry with more efficient and technologically advanced solutions.
description.3: Autoliv is one of the world's largest global suppliers of automotive safety systems, specializing in airbags, seat belts, and other critical vehicle safety components. With over 70 years of experience, Autoliv operates in more than 27 countries, employing over 60,000 people in its global network, and is a key player in the automotive industry with a presence in all major vehicle markets. This OutSystems project aims to drive Autoliv's digital transformation, focusing on creating innovative applications for the supply area. The solution seeks to optimize purchasing management processes, inventory control, and supplier communication, promoting greater efficiency and integration among the various stages of the supply chain. Using the OutSystems platform, Autoliv aims to improve operational agility, reduce response times, and increase information accuracy, aligning technology with the company's strategic needs. This initiative reinforces Autoliv's commitment to innovation and operational efficiency in the automotive sector.
description.4: Avery Dennison is an American multinational and global leader in materials for labels, packaging, and identification solutions, with a presence in more than 50 countries and over 30,000 employees worldwide. The company stands out for its innovation and technology applied to various sectors, including retail, logistics, automotive, and healthcare. To accelerate its digital transformation, applications are being developed using the OutSystems platform, modernizing processes and boosting operational efficiency. The project aims to create agile, scalable, and customized solutions, improving productivity, reducing costs, and enhancing the experience of internal and external users. With this initiative, Avery Dennison reinforces its commitment to innovation and digitalization, ensuring greater competitiveness and adaptation to new market demands.
description.5: Exelon is one of the largest energy companies in the United States, supplying electricity and gas to millions of customers. With operations in several states and a robust energy generation portfolio, Exelon stands out for its continuous pursuit of innovation and operational efficiency. To drive its digital transformation, RPA (Robotic Process Automation) solutions using UiPath are being implemented, automating repetitive and complex tasks. The project's main objectives are to achieve savings in operational hours, allow employees to focus on strategic activities, reduce costs by eliminating time-consuming and inefficient manual processes, and decrease human errors, ensuring greater accuracy and compliance in operations. Automations are primarily developed for systems such as Oracle and Microsoft Excel, optimizing financial, administrative, and operational flows. With this initiative, Exelon strengthens its efficiency, innovation, and competitiveness in the energy sector.
